TextBlock.Text: NYLOX: This place is neat. I like the structure. Feels spacious.
NYLOX: Now that Quiax has cracked the code, we'll be off to the Ghost Moon in a matter of days.
NYLOX: But the journey is so dangerous... Darvy was killed by messing with 4D matter.
NYLOX: Agh, what's wrong with you? They've proven it's safe!
NYLOX: You know what? I'm going to <color=hide the code in pieces around this system.></color>. I'll put the pieces in places so <color=orange>obvious you'd overlook them</color>.
NYLOX: That way nobody will make the journey.
NYLOX: Let's see here, <color=orange>'ADFBEC'</color>. That'll work wonders.
